Altitude.card_desc: [Armor] Restore {scale=20|20}% of your maximum Booster Fuel when you get a Kill or Elimination.

Bask.card_desc: [Salvo] Heal for {scale=25|25} each time Salvo hits a target.

Combustible.card_desc: [Fire Spit] Fire Spit now knocks back and deals an additional 300 damage over 2s.

Condescension.card_desc: [Fire Spit] Reduce the Cooldown of Thrust by {scale=1|1}s for hitting an enemy champion with Fire Spit.

Follow the Scent.card_desc: [Fire Spit] Increase the size of your Fire Spit by {scale=20|20}%.

Hot Swap.card_desc: [Weapon] Weapon hits increase your Reload Speed by {scale=10|10}% for 3s.

Hyper Boost.card_desc: [Salvo] Restore {scale=3|3}% of your Booster Fuel each time Salvo hits a target.

Lung Capacity.card_desc: [Fire Spit] Heal for {scale=50|50} health for each enemy champion hit with Fire Spit.

Masterful.card_desc: [Fire Spit] Fire Spit's Cooldown is reduced by {scale=0.5|0.5}s for each enemy Champion hit.

Propel.card_desc: [Thrust] Increased the forward distance of Thrust by {scale=25|25}%

Rain of Fire.card_desc: [Thrust] Booster consumes {scale=10|10}% less fuel for 5s after using Thrust.

Spitfire.card_desc: [Salvo] Salvo's Cooldown is reduced by {scale=0.25|0.25}s for every shot hit.

Antreiben.card_desc: [Düsenantrieb] Erhöht die Vorwärtsbewegung durch Düsenantrieb um {scale=25|25}%.

Dezimieren.card_desc: [Salve] Erhöht den Explosionsradius von Salve um {scale=15|15}%.

Hitzkopf.card_desc: [Salve] Reduziert die Abklingzeit von Salve um {scale=0.25|0.25}s pro Treffer.

Hyperschub.card_desc: [Salve] Für jedes mit Salve getroffene Ziel wird {scale=3|3}% Raketenrucksack-Treibstoff erzeugt.

Jagdfieber.card_desc: [Düsenantrieb] Todesstöße reduzieren die Abklingzeit von Düsenantrieb um {scale=15|15}%.

Lungenkapazit\u00e4t.card_desc: [Feuerspucke] Für jeden mit Feuerspucke getroffenen Gegner wirst du {scale=50|50} LP geheilt.

Meisterung.card_desc: [Feuerspucke] Reduziert die Abklingzeit von Feuerspucke pro getroffenem gegnerischem Champion um {scale=0.5|0.5}s.

Schnellwechsel.card_desc: [Waffe] Waffentreffer erhöhen dein Nachladetempo 3s lang um {scale=10|10}%.

Spitzenpr\u00e4dator.card_desc: [Rüstung] Erhöht deine maximale Gesundheit um {scale=50|50} LP.

Treibstofftank.card_desc: [Rüstung] Erhöht die Treibstoffkapazität des Raketenrucksacks um {scale=10|10}%.

\u00dcberleben.card_desc: [Düsenantrieb] Fällst du unter {scale=10|10}% deiner maximalen Gesundheit, wird die Abklingzeit von Düsenantrieb um 100% reduziert.

Verachtung.card_desc: [Feuerspucke] Treffer mit Feuerspucke reduzieren die Abklingzeit von Düsenantrieb um {scale=1|1}s.

W.Y.R.M.-D\u00fcsen.card_desc: Dein Raketenrucksack verfügt über verbesserte Flugeigenschaften.

\u00c0 la trace.card_desc: [Crachat de feu] Le projectile de Crachat de feu est {scale=20|20}% plus volumineux.

Altitude.card_desc: [Armure] Chaque élimination vous redonne {scale=20|20}% de combustible.

Capacit\u00e9 pulmonaire.card_desc: [Crachat de feu] Vous regagnez {scale=50|50} PV par champion touché avec Crachat de feu.

Col\u00e9rique.card_desc: [Salve] Salve se recharge {scale=0.25|0.25}s plus vite par ennemi touché.

Combustible.card_desc: [Crachat de feu] Crachat de feu repousse et inflige 300 dégâts supplémentaires en 2s.

Condescendance.card_desc: [Crachat de feu] Crachat de feu réduit le temps de recharge de Poussée de {scale=1|1}s s'il touche un ennemi.

D\u00e9vastation.card_desc: [Salve] Le rayon d'explosion des projectiles de Salve augmente de {scale=15|15}%.

Fusillade.card_desc: [Arme] Les tirs directs infligent 25% de dégâts supplémentaires.

Hyper catalyseur.card_desc: [Salve] Vous récupérez {scale=3|3}% de votre combustible chaque fois que Salve touche une cible.

Joie de la chasse.card_desc: [Poussée] Chaque exécution réduit le temps de recharge de Poussée de {scale=15|15}%.

Magistral.card_desc: [Crachat de feu] Crachat de feu se recharge {scale=0.5|0.5}s plus vite par champion touché.

Permutation.card_desc: [Arme] Vos attaques de base réussies augmentent votre vitesse de rechargement de {scale=10|10}% pendant 3s.

Pluie de feu.card_desc: [Poussée] Pendant 5s après l'activation de Poussée, vous consommez {scale=10|10}% de combustible en moins.

Propulsion.card_desc: [Poussée] La distance de Poussée augmente de {scale=25|25}%.

R\u00e9acteur W.Y.R.M..card_desc: Les capacités de vol du Catalyseur augmentent.

R\u00e9servoir.card_desc: [Armure] Vous avez {scale=10|10}% de combustible en plus.

Savourer la proie.card_desc: [Salve] Vous récupérez {scale=25|25} PV chaque fois qu'un tir de Salve touche une cible.

Survie.card_desc: [Poussée] Passer en-dessous de {scale=10|10}% de PV réinitialise le temps de recharge de Poussée.

\u55b7\u5410\u4e13\u7cbe.card_desc: [火焰喷吐] 每命中一个敌人英雄，火焰喷吐的冷却时间都将减少{scale=0.5|0.5}秒

\u55b7\u706b\u8005.card_desc: [齐射] 每有一发火箭命中目标，齐射的冷却时间就会降低{scale=0.25|0.25}秒

\u56de\u6696.card_desc: [齐射] 齐射每击中一个目标都能使你回复{scale=25|25}点生命

\u5927\u53f7\u706b\u7bad.card_desc: [武器] 直接命中的攻击会造成35%额外伤害

\u5c16\u7aef\u730e\u98df\u8005.card_desc: [护甲] 获得{scale=14|14}%控制抗性和减速抗性

\u5c45\u9ad8\u4e34\u4e0b.card_desc: [火焰喷吐] 火焰喷吐命中一个敌人，减少推进的冷却时间{scale=1|1}秒

\u5c60\u622e.card_desc: [齐射] 齐射对护盾的伤害提高{scale=10|10}%

\u63a8\u529b\u5f3a\u5316.card_desc: [喷射飞行] 增加喷射飞行的前冲距离{scale=25|25}%

\u6613\u71c3\u9f99\u6d8e.card_desc: [火焰喷吐] 火焰喷吐现在会造成击退效果，且会在2秒内造成30%的额外持续性伤害

\u6c14\u5473\u8ffd\u8e2a.card_desc: [火焰喷吐] 被火焰喷吐命中的敌人，3秒内获得的治疗效果减少{scale=15|15}%

\u706b\u7130\u4e4b\u96e8.card_desc: [喷射飞行] 技能激活后的5秒内，助推器能量消耗减少{scale=10|10}%

\u71c3\u6599\u7bb1.card_desc: [护甲] 增加推进器的能量最大值{scale=10|10}%

\u72e9\u730e\u6b32\u671b.card_desc: [喷射飞行] 击败敌人将使喷射飞行的冷却时间减少{scale=15|15}%

\u751f\u5b58\u672c\u80fd.card_desc: [喷射飞行] 当你的生命值低于{scale=10|10}%时，喷射飞行的冷却时间减少100%

\u7a7a\u4e2d\u5236\u9738.card_desc: [护甲] 击败敌人或助攻时，回复{scale=20|20}%的推进器能量

\u8d81\u70ed\u6362\u5f39.card_desc: [武器] 普通攻击造成伤害将提高你的换弹速度{scale=10|10}%持续3秒

\u8d85\u5927\u80ba\u6d3b\u91cf.card_desc: [火焰喷吐] 火焰喷吐每命中一个敌方英雄都将为你回复{scale=50|50}点生命值

\u8d85\u7ea7\u7a81\u8fdb.card_desc: [齐射] 齐射每命中一个敌人,推进器燃料回复{scale=3|3}%

\u9b54\u9f99\u98de\u884c\u5668.card_desc: [护甲] 喷射器的飞行速度提高40%

Expectorate.card_desc: [Loogie] Increase the projectile speed of loogie by {50}%

Anuencia.card_desc: [Gargajo ígneo] Se reduce la recarga de Despegue en {scale=1|1}s al alcanzar a un campeón enemigo con Gargajo ígneo.

Capacidad pulmonar.card_desc: [Gargajo ígneo] Te curas {scale=50|50} PS por cada campeón enemigo que alcances con Gargajo ígneo.

Combustible.card_desc: [Gargajo ígneo] Gargajo ígneo ahora repele e inflige 300 PS de daño adicional de su daño durante 2s.

Hiperaumento.card_desc: [Quemarropa] Recupera un {scale=3|3}% del combustible de Impulso cada vez que Quemarropa golpea a un objetivo.

Intercambio.card_desc: [Arma] Los ataques certeros con tu arma aumentan la Velocidad de recarga un {scale=10|10}% durante 3 s.

Jets W.Y.R.M..card_desc: Impulso mejora la calidad de vuelo.

Lluvia flagrante.card_desc: [Despegue] Durante 5s después de usar el Despegue, Impulso consume un {scale=10|10}% menos de combustible.

Propulsi\u00f3n.card_desc: [Despegue] Aumentas la distancia de avance del Despegue un {scale=25|25}%.

Rastro de olor.card_desc: [Gargajo ígneo] Aumenta el tamaño de Gargajo ígneo un {scale=20|20}%.

Recreo.card_desc: [Quemarropa] Cuando alcanzas a un objetivo con Quemarropa, te curas {scale=25|25} PS.

Supervivencia.card_desc: [Despegue] Si tu salud máxima baja más del {scale=10|10}%, la recarga de Despegue se reduce un 100%.

Tiroteo.card_desc: [Arma] Los disparos directos infligen un 25% más de daño.

Altitude.card_desc: [Armadura] Restaura {scale=20|20}% do combustível máximo do jato ao conseguir uma eliminação ou assistência.

Chuva de Fogo.card_desc: [Impulso] O jato consome {scale=10|10}% menos combustível por 5s após usar Impulso.

Comemora\u00e7\u00e3o.card_desc: [Salva de Mísseis] Cura em {scale=25|25} a cada vez que a Salva de Mísseis atinge um alvo.

Condescend\u00eancia.card_desc: [Cospe-Fogo] Reduz o intervalo do Impulso em {scale=1|1}s ao atingir um inimigo com o Cospe-Fogo.

Emo\u00e7\u00e3o da Ca\u00e7ada.card_desc: [Impulso] O intervalo de Impulso é reduzido em {scale=15|15}% ao executar um golpe fatal.

Fuzilamento.card_desc: [Arma] Tiros diretos causam 25% a mais de dano.

Hiper Aumento.card_desc: [Salva de Mísseis] Repõe {scale=3|3}% do combustível do seu jato do Impulso a cada vez que Salva de Mísseis atinge um alvo.

Inflam\u00e1vel.card_desc: [Cospe-Fogo] Cospe-Fogo agora causa repulsão e causa 300 de dano adicional no decorrer de 2s.

Jatos W.Y.R.M..card_desc: Seu Impulso tem qualidade de voo aprimorada.

Maestria.card_desc: [Cospe-Fogo] O intervalo de Cospe-Fogo é reduzido em {scale=0.5|0.5}s para cada inimigo atingido.

Mais Combust\u00edvel.card_desc: [Armadura] Aumenta a quantidade de combustível do jato em {scale=10|10}%.

Massacre de M\u00edsseis.card_desc: [Salva de Mísseis] O intervalo da Salva de Mísseis é reduzido em {scale=0.25|0.25}s para cada disparo que atingir um inimigo.

Parceria Quente.card_desc: [Arma] Tiros certeiros aumentam a velocidade para recarregar a arma em {scale=10|10}% por 3s.

Poderoso Pulm\u00e3o.card_desc: [Cospe-fogo] Cura em {scale=50|50} de vida para cada Campeão que você acertar com Cospe-Fogo.

Propelir.card_desc: [Impulso] Aumenta a distância percorrida pelo Impulso em {scale=25|25}%.

Siga o Faro.card_desc: [Cospe-fogo] Aumenta o tamanho do Cospe-fogo em {scale=20|20}%.

Sobreviv\u00eancia.card_desc: [Impulso] Chegar abaixo de {scale=10|10}% da sua vida máxima reduz em 100% o intervalo do Impulso.

\u0412\u044b\u0436\u0438\u0432\u0430\u04.card_desc: [Взлет] При уровне здоровья ниже {scale=10|10}% от максимального Перезарядка Взлета сокращается на 100%.

\u0412\u044b\u0441\u043e\u0442\u0430.card_desc: [Броня] Убийства и устранения восстанавливают {scale=20|20}% от максимального запаса топлива.

\u0413\u0438\u043f\u0435\u0440\u0443\u04.card_desc: [Очередь] Каждое попадание по цели Очередью восстанавливает {scale=3|3}% вашего топлива.

\u0413\u043e\u0440\u044e\u0447\u0435\u04.card_desc: [Огненный плевок] Огненный плевок теперь отбрасывает врагов и наносит целям 300 ед. бонусного урона в течение 2 с.

\u0413\u043e\u0440\u044f\u0447\u0430\u04.card_desc: [Оружие] Попадание в цель увеличивает скорость перезарядки на {scale=10|10}% на 3 с.

\u0417.\u041c.\u0415.\u0419. \u0421\u043.card_desc: Управление в воздухе во время действия Ускорителя улучшается.

\u0418\u0434\u0438 \u043f\u043e \u0437\u.card_desc: [Огненный плевок] Размер снарядов Огненного плевка увеличивается на {scale=20|20}%.

\u041c\u0430\u0441\u0442\u0435\u0440\u04.card_desc: [Огненный плевок] Каждое попадание по чемпиону сокращает перезарядку Огненного плевка на {scale=0.5|0.5} с.

\u041e\u0431\u044a\u0435\u043c \u043b\u0.card_desc: [Огненный плевок] Каждое попадание по вражескому чемпиону Огненным плевком исцеляет вас на {scale=50|50} ед.

\u041e\u0433\u043d\u0435\u043d\u043d\u04.card_desc: [Очередь] Каждое попадание по врагу сокращает перезарядку Очереди на {scale=0.25|0.25} с.
[Взлет] После использования Взлета Ускоритель потребляет на {scale=10|10}% меньше топлива в течение 5 с.

\u041e\u0445\u043e\u0442\u043d\u0438\u04.card_desc: [Взлет] Смертельные удары сокращают перезарядку Взлета на {scale=15|15}%.

\u0420\u0430\u0441\u0441\u0442\u0440\u04.card_desc: [Оружие] Прямые попадания наносят на 25% больше урона.

\u0421\u043d\u0438\u0441\u0445\u043e\u04.card_desc: [Огненный плевок] Попадание по врагу Огненным плевком сокращает перезарядку Взлета на {scale=1|1} с.

\u0421\u043e\u0433\u0440\u0435\u0432\u04.card_desc: [Очередь] Вы исцеляетесь на {scale=25|25} ед. при каждом попадании Очереди в цель.

Bak.card_desc: [Pancerz] Zwiększa rezerwę paliwa w Dopalaczu o {scale=10|10}%.

\u0141askawo\u015b\u0107.card_desc: [Plucie ogniem] Trafienie wrogiego czempiona Pluciem ogniem skraca czas odnowienia Odbicia o {scale=1|1} s.

Mistrzostwo.card_desc: [Plucie ogniem] Każde trafienie wrogiego czempiona skraca czas odnowienia Plucia ogniem o {scale=0.5|0.5} s.

Ogrzanie.card_desc: [Salwa] Przywraca {scale=25|25} PZ po każdym trafieniu Salwą.

Plucie ogniem.card_desc: [Salwa] Każde celne trafienie Salwą skraca jej czas odnowienia o {scale=0.25|0.25} s.

Pojemno\u015b\u0107 p\u0142uc.card_desc: [Plucie ogniem] Każde trafienie wrogiego czempiona Pluciem ognia przywraca {scale=50|50} PZ.

Przetrwanie.card_desc: [Odbicie] Spadek poniżej {scale=10|10}% PZ skraca czas odnowienia Odbicia o 100%.

Rakiety S.M.O.K..card_desc: Lot za pomocą Dopalacza jest teraz płynniejszy.

Superdopalacz.card_desc: [Salwa] Przywraca {scale=3|3}% twojego paliwa za każde trafienie celu Salwą.

Szale\u0144stwo \u0142ow\u00f3w.card_desc: [Odbicie] Śmiertelne ciosy skracają czas odnowienia Odbicia o {scale=15|15}%.

Szybka zmiana.card_desc: [Broń] Trafienia bronią zwiększają szybkość przeładowania o {scale=10|10}% na 3 s.

Wysoko\u015b\u0107.card_desc: [Pancerz] Po zabójstwie lub eliminacji przywraca {scale=20|20}% paliwa w dopalaczu.

Zap\u0142on.card_desc: [Plucie ogniem] Plucie ogniem odrzuca cele i zadaje trafionym celom dodatkowo 300 obrażeń przez 2 s.

Ate\u015f P\u00fcsk\u00fcrtme.card_desc: [Yaylım Ateşi] Yaylım Ateşi'nin Bekleme Süresi, isabet eden her atış için {scale=0.25|0.25} sn azalır.

Ate\u015f Ya\u011fmuru.card_desc: [İtiş] İtiş'i kullandıktan sonraki 5 sn boyunca, İtici %{scale=10|10} daha az yakıt kullanır.

Av Heyecan\u0131.card_desc: [İtiş] Bir Öldürücü Darbe indirdiğinde İtiş'in Bekleme Süresi %{scale=15|15} azalır.

Ci\u011fer Kapasitesi.card_desc: [Ateş Tükürüğü] Ateş Tükürüğü ile vurduğun her düşman şampiyon için {scale=50|50} Can iyileş.

Hayatta Kalma.card_desc: [İtiş] Maksimum Canının %{scale=10|10} kadarının altına düştüğünde İtiş'in Bekleme Süresi %100 azalır.

Hiper G\u00fc\u00e7lendirme.card_desc: [Yaylım Ateşi] Yaylım Ateşi bir hedefi her vurduğunda İtici Yakıtı %{scale=3|3} dolar.

\u0130rtifa.card_desc: [Zırh] Katletme veya Saf Dışı Bırakma yaptığında maksimum İtici Yakıtının %{scale=20|20} kadarını yenile.

Is\u0131nma.card_desc: [Yaylım Ateşi] Yaylım Ateşi bir hedefi her vurduğunda {scale=25|25} Can iyileş.

Katliam.card_desc: [Yaylım Ateşi] Yaylım Ateşi patlamalarının etki alanını %{scale=15|15} artır.

Tam \u0130sabet.card_desc: [Silah] Doğrudan atışlar %25 daha fazla hasar verir.

Tenezz\u00fcl.card_desc: [Ateş Tükürüğü] Ateş Tükürüğü ile bir düşman şampiyonu vurmak İtiş'in Bekleme Süresini {scale=1|1} sn azaltır.

Ustaca.card_desc: [Ateş Tükürüğü] Ateş Tükürüğü'nün Bekleme Süresi, vurulan her düşman Şampiyon için {scale=0.5|0.5} sn azalır.

Yan\u0131c\u0131.card_desc: [Ateş Tükürüğü] Ateş Tükürüğü geri iter ve 2 sn içinde ek 300 hasar verir.
